知ってのとおり: (しってのとおり) - as we know
知っての通り: (しってのとおり) - as we know
知は力なり: (ちはちからなり) - knowledge is power
知らす: (しらす) - to inform/to notify; to know; to reign
知らず: (しらず) - not having/unaffected by; (often as ～は知らず) aside/I don't know about ...; (at the beginning of a sentence) I know not whether/I know not if
知らず知らず: (しらずしらず) - unconsciously; unwittingly; unawares
知らず識らず: (しらずしらず) - unconsciously; unwittingly; unawares
知らせる: (しらせる) - to notify; to advise; to inform
知らない: (しらない) - unknown/strange; I don't care/I don't know and I feel nothing
知らないうちに: (しらないうちに) - before one knew it; before one realized it
知らないふり: (しらないふり) - feigning ignorance; acting dumb
知らない振り: (しらないふり) - feigning ignorance; acting dumb
知らない間に: (しらないまに) - at some time, without being noticed; before one knew; before one realised
知らぬが仏: (しらぬがほとけ) - Ignorance is bliss
知らぬは亭主許り也: (しらぬはていしゅばかりなり) - Only the husband does not know
知らぬ顔: (しらぬかお) - pretending not to know; feigning ignorance
知られる: (しられる) - (passive voice)  to be known
知らんかった: (しらんかった) - didn't know; was unaware
知らんがな: (しらんがな) - how should I know?; don't ask me
知らん振り: (しらんふり) - pretending not to know; feigning ignorance
知らん顔: (しらんかお) - unconcerned air; indifference; feigned ignorance; pretending not to recognize (somebody)
知りはじめる: (しりはじめる) - to begin to know
知り初める: (しりそめる) - to begin to know; to know for the first time
知り合う: (しりあう) - to get to know (someone); to make acquaintance
知り始める: (しりはじめる) - to begin to know
知り尽くす: (しりつくす) - to have full knowledge (of something); to know something thoroughly
知り渡る: (しりわたる) - (mispelling of 知れ渡る) to be well known
知る: (shiru) - estar ciente de, saber, estar consciente de, cognizar; notar, perceber, sentir; entender, compreender, captar; lembrar, estar familiarizado com (um procedimento)
知るものか: (しるものか) - Who cares?; See if I care; Who knows?; How should I know?
知るよしもない: (しるよしもない) - to have no way of knowing; to be completely ignorant of
知るよしも無い: (しるよしもない) - to have no way of knowing; to be completely ignorant of
知る人ぞ知る: (しるひとぞしる) - well-known only to those in the know; be well-known but to the few; highly regarded by a select few
知る権利: (しるけんり) - right to know; right to access to information
知る由もない: (しるよしもない) - to have no way of knowing; to be completely ignorant of
知る由も無い: (しるよしもない) - to have no way of knowing; to be completely ignorant of
知る限り: (しるかぎり) - as far as I know
知れる: (しれる) - to become known/to come to light/to be discovered; (often in the negative)  to be known/to be understood; to obviously not amount to much/to seem trivial; (in the form しれたこと) to be evident/to be obvious/to go without saying; (in forms like どれほど…かしれない) to be very intense (worry, hope, etc.)/to be extremely severe
知ろしめす: (しろしめす) - to know; to reign
知ろし召す: (しろしめす) - to know; to reign
知ろし食す: (しろしめす) - to know; to reign
知事選: (ちじせん) - gubernatorial election; election of governor; gubernatorial campaign; gubernatorial race
知余って勇足らず: (ちあまってゆうたらず) - lacking boldness by being too sagacious; being too sagacious to be bold
知初める: (しりそめる) - to begin to know; to know for the first time
知力: (ちりょく) - wisdom; intellectual power; intelligence; mental capacity; brains
知勇兼備: (ちゆうけんび) - (yoji) having both wisdom and courage
知合う: (しりあう) - to get to know (someone); to make acquaintance
知名度: (ちめいど) - degree of familiarity; popularity
知客: (しか) - head monk in charge of the administrative section of a zendo (Zen)
知将: (ちしょう) - skilled manager; resourceful general
知己朋友: (ちきほうゆう) - (yoji) intimate friends and acquaintances
知徳兼備: (ちとくけんび) - (yoji) having both (wide) knowledge and (high) virtue
知徳円満: (ちとくえんまん) - (yoji) having both (wide) knowledge and (high) virtue
知徳合一: (ちとくごういつ) - (yoji) the unity of knowledge and virtue
知恵: (chie) - sabedoria, perspicácia, sagacidade, senso, inteligência; prajna (visão que leva à iluminação)
知恵の輪: (ちえのわ) - puzzle ring/wire puzzle; exercise where students link crossed hands in a circle and try working together and without letting go
知恵を絞る: (ちえをしぼる) - to rack one's brain
知恵分別: (ちえふんべつ) - (yoji) wisdom and good (common sense) judgment
知恵才覚: (ちえさいかく) - (yoji) having wisdom and resources; being clever and talented
知恵熱: (ちえぼとり) - teething fever; developmental fever/fever that brings with it an intellectual or psycho-developmental growth spurt
知恵袋: (ちえぶくろ) - bag full of wisdom/bag containing all the world's wisdom; person who is a fountain of wisdom/brains (of a company)
知恵負け: (ちえまけ) - done in by one's own cleverness
知情意: (ちじょうい) - emotion and volition; intellect
知日家: (ちにちか) - person who is knowledgeable about Japan; Japanologist
知木: (ちぎ) - ornamental crossed rafter ends on shrine gables
知的レベル: (ちてきレベル) - intellectual level; level of intelligence
知的好奇心: (ちてきこうきしん) - intellectual curiosity; out of curiosity; inquisitiveness
知的所有権: (ちてきしょゆうけん) - intellectual property rights
